text:
Purdue University
STATION W B A A
LAFAYETTE. INDIANA
August 23, 1955
Harold E. Hill, Associate Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Uni versity of Illinois
I 19 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harold:
Thanks much for your offer to send us the two
SETS OF ADDRESSOGRAPH LABELS. WE WILL PAY YOU THE $5.00.
However, it seems to me that this is adding the proverbial
STRAW ON THE CAMELâ€™S BACK. AFTER ALL WE ARE USING THESE
LABELS TO SEND OUT MATERIALS WHICH WE BELIEVE WILL BE OF
INTEREST AND HELP TO NAEB MEMBERS. NEEDLESS TO SAY THE
PREPARATION OF THE ADDITIONAL COPIES COSTS US MANY TIMES
THIS SERVICE FEE. I KNOW YOUR PROBLEM AND I AM NOT
PARTICULARLY IRKED AT YOUR REQUEST, I JUST WANTED YOU TO
SEE THROUGH OUR SIDE OF IT.
Hope it will work out that you and Dorothy can
GET OVER DURING SEPTEMBER.
S I NC ERE-LY,
Director Radio Station WBAA
